Company Introduction: SgurrEnergy was founded in 2002 in the UK, with the goal of excelling in renewable energy consulting. In 2007, an office was established in India to provide technical advisory, engineering and project management services for solar energy projects worldwide. With a promising future that resulted in accelerated global market expansion, we built a clientele of some of the worldтАЩs illustrious names. With an extensive track record of over 61GW of solar projects globally, SgurrEnergy differentiates itself as an engineering consultant with a strong technical background; a 360┬░ service provider capable of successfully delivering projects introduced at any stage of the project life-cycle.

SgurrEnergy Skill Development program:
In today's age of globalization, skill building is significant to increase the strength and quality of workforce for improved productivity and economic growth. Skills and knowledge development are the essential forces behind the financial growth and community development of any country. Skill building is a powerful equipment to empower individuals and improve social acceptance. SgurrEnergy intends to develop the skills of its workforce as this forms the basis of learning in our culture. The idea of skill development is to identify and upgrade university graduates with the right skills needed to perform job effectively. 

SgurrEnergy shall incur and expend significant costs and resources towards organising specialized and niche Training Programs for you throughout the Training Period of three years. The program is designed to enhance the productivity, capability, business effectiveness for overall development.  

We support transition from University to the industry to improve performance and achieve career goals to provide a competitive edge. 

Thinking beyond the job and dedication towards being successful in the career should be the aim. Hence to ensure that, SgurrEnergy skill development plan is designed in a way to handle the changes of the corporate world. 

We at SgurrEnergy offer a whole host of training programme for overall development of its employees that equip them with all necessary technical and social skills to accomplish the work and grow in their career.
Process тАУ
The career growth plan is prepared considering company and employee's interests. The career growth plan is divided into 6 terms and each term has specific training topics. The training shall be imparted through External and Internal Industry experts.

Benefits: яАн
яАн Shadowing and training experiences with knowledgeable professionals.
яАн During the course of your employment SgurrEnergy will organize and fund technical and functional trainings to enhance your skills, capabilities and business effectiveness for a period of 3 years.
яАн You will be eligible for annual appraisals subject to your performance. Your annual raise percentage will be based on your performance.

   Percentage Hike
Year 1      - 0% - 50%
Year 2      - 0% - 50%
Year 3      - 0% - 70%
яАн On completion of 4 years with us you will be eligible for Rs. 1.50 Lakhs as Retainer bonus.
яАн On completion of 5 years you will be eligible for Rs. 2.50 Lakhs as Retainer Bonus.
яАн You will also be eligible for all other company benefits.

Terms and Conditions:
1. You shall be required to undertake Training Programs during the course of your employment with the Company.
2. The Company reserves the right to schedule additional Training Programs beyond the Training Period and you shall be required to attend those Training Programs during the course of your employment with the Company.
3. You shall not undertake any external training on behalf of the Company unless otherwise approved and permitted by the Company. Nothing contained herein shall obligate the Company from organising a minimum number of Training Programs during the Training Period.
4. Training Costs: You hereby agree and acknowledge your liability to pay the Company following costs incurred towards the Training Programs, at CompanyтАЩs discretion, after completion of your probationary period, in the event you terminate the Agreement within the following time frame:

LEARNING OUTCOME
STAGE I тАУ Year 1  -  Learning and trainings to enhance present conceptual understanding for technical         
                                   applications.
STAGE II тАУ Year 2 - Supervised Implementation. Practical exposure in performing a defined activity. Assisting 
                                   Senior Engineers in closing tasks.
STAGE III тАУ Year 3  - Independent project/ task handling. Practical exposure in handling critical documents and 
                                     trouble shooting.

i. If you terminate the Agreement prior to the expiry of 6 months, you shall be liable to pay 100% of the salary offered during the period.

ii. If you terminate the Agreement prior to the expiry of 1 year from the completion of the Training Period, you shall be liable to pay 90% of the salary offered during the period.

iii. If you terminate the Agreement after 1 year but before expiry of 2 years from the completion of the Training Period, you shall be liable to pay 75% of salary offered during the period.

iv. If you terminate the Agreement after 2 years but before expiry of 3 years from the completion of the Training Period, you shall be liable to pay 50% of salary offered during the period.

Upon joining you will be required to submit copy of your passport size photograph, copies of your passing and employment certificates along with originals, identity proof and address proof which will be returned to you after verification.

We are initiating campus recruitment for Graduate Engineering Trainee (GET) from September 2023 who will be on-boarded on 01 July 2024.

Selection Process: - 

1 Online Aptitude Test 

2 Online Technical Test for Shortlisted candidate

3. Face to Face HR Interview at pandharpur

 To kick-start the process, we invite details of students who are interested in exploring career with Wipro PARI, in the excel enclosed.

Student Eligible Criteria:

Candidate should be 60% throughout in their Academics.
No Live or previous Backlogs.

We are enclosing the profile of our organization for the students.  They can also visit our company website www.wipropari.com

About Wipro PARI:
Wipro PARI; a part of Wipro group (turnover of more than $ 10 Bn); is India biggest automation company providing innovative solution to customers across North & South America, Europe, and Asia. The  manufacturing and assembly facility in India, Germany and USA enables us to cater to customer base across the globe. The company has developed capabilities of integrating Robots, PLCs, Sensors, Vision, conveyors and many other equipmentтАЩs to provide solution in the areas of Electric Vehicle Manufacturing (module, battery pack, electric drive, rotor, stator, e-axle assembly), Power Train Assembly, Engine Assembly, Gear Box Assembly, Machine line, Seat Assembly, Tyre Handling, Intra Logistics and Storage, Packaging, Palletizing, Loading, Automated Storage & Retrieval Systems, Automated Guided Vehicle, Rail Guided Carts etc.
Wipro PARI has received numerous recognitions and awards like US AID (US Government Agency), DST (Indian Government Agency), CMTI (A Central Institution in Manufacturing) and FIE (Private Industrial Forum) for its work in Industrial Automation, which demonstrates our capabilities built over the last 3 decades. We invite individuals to be part of the team to deliver cutting edge solution at our facilities and client locations across the globe. If you thrive for speed of action, depth of technical solution, desire to make a mark in automation industry and keenness to make a difference for the customer, we have a spot for you.

Visit our website www.wipropari.com to know more about what we do.

Opportunity Landscape for GETs
Trainees will undergo company and business orientation followed by on-the-job training in the respective functional domain. We have opportunities in the following functional areas: 
Functional Areas                                                            Specialization Required
Mechanical Design                                             Production/Mechanical/Mechatronics
Project Management                                          Mechanical
Project Commissioning & Services                  Mechanical 
Production/Assembly                                        Mechanical 
Supply Chain Management                               Mechanical

On completion of 1 year of training period, trainees will be absorbed as confirmed employee. Trainees are required to sign a service bond of Rs 1 Lakh for two years of service bond with the company on the day of joining.

Compensation:
Candidate will receive a gross salary (including bonus) of Rs 3.20 lakh till the period of training.Medical Insurance, Gratuity, Transportation is over above the gross salary.

10/23/23, 14:03 - Sameer Katekar Sir: Microsoft and SAP, through their CSR initiatives, aim at strengthening the social infrastructure, capacity building, and developing a sustainable approach to future skills training.

The program aims to future IT skills talent pool especially in peri-urban and tier-II / III towns across India, coming from underserved backgrounds with the objective of workforce readiness and employability. The training will be conducted in the areas of Applied Cloud Computing for Software Development or Industrial Artificial intelligence with cloud computing. The curriculum aims to create a deep understanding and application of the technologies by students.

 

Key Highlights

All the eligible students in the program will be provided with support for jobs/internship opportunities
Thought leadership of Microsoft and SAP in the technology domain
Core Technology and modular course for skill development of students
Mentorship from experts to work on projects aimed at leveraging technology to solve technical problems
Opportunity to demonstrate their project innovation through regional hackathons or innovation forums to varied industry and academic experts
Students will receive joint certification from Microsoft and SAP upon successful completion of the course

Profile: Trainee Software Engineer ( Development / Testing )

Category 1: BE, BTech (IT, CS, Electronics, ENTC, Electrical, Mechanical, Instru, etc)/MCA/MCS - 2024 Batch with 50% marks
Category 2: BSc (IT, Comp, Elex, Maths, Stats), BCA, BCS, BBA-CA, MSc (IT, Comp, Elex, Maths, Stats)- 2024 Batch with 50% marks

- Aptitude Test (based on Aptitude, Reasoning and Prog. Fundamentals)
- Group Discussion

- Training by Senior Experts.
- Free Placement Assistance with 3200+ Clients like Amdocs, Bitwise, Deloitte, Hexaware, TechMahindra etc
- Regular Campus Drives

11/1/23, 19:23 - Sameer Katekar Sir: https://youtu.be/Y5YZckB0xHk?si=6_Ic6y5fsqzUzUo3
11/1/23, 20:09 - Sameer Katekar Sir: *If a college lacks a training and placement officer, it can have several consequences:*

1. Reduced Job Opportunities: Without a dedicated officer to liaise with companies and organize placement drives, students may have limited access to job opportunities.

2. Missed Skill Development: Training officers often organize workshops and programs to enhance students' employability skills. Without them, students might miss out on these skill-building opportunities.

3. Lack of Guidance: Students may not receive guidance on career choices, resume building, or interview preparation, making their job search more challenging.

4. Decreased Campus Recruitment: Companies may be less inclined to visit the college for recruitment if there is no designated placement officer to facilitate the process.

5. Student Struggles: Students might need to take on the responsibility of organizing placements, which can be overwhelming and distracting from their studies.

11/6/23, 21:32 - Sameer Katekar Sir: The process will be:

1. Each student gets only 1- Chance to attempt the test. 
2. The duration of the test is 45 mins & only those scoring >85% will move to the next round! 
3. The test window will remain open for 2 hours
4. The test MUST be taken on a LAPTOP/DESKTOP. Mobile testing would always Fail. 
5. Students MUST have a stable internet connection. Any disruption the students would be logged out. Re-Test would not be permitted.
6. Based on the results, the core test would be shared with the PASSED Students. 

**ALL students irrespective of the branch and percentage can participate in this preliminary assessment!** 

They can do assessments from home or lab, provided they use LAPTOPS ONLY!
*Test date and time:9th Nov from 4 PM - 6 pm*ЁЯСЖ

About Company :(www.beaconstac.com)
Beaconstac started out as a way to solve the disconnect between the physical and digital worlds by leveraging technology. The solution was to deliver proximity marketing experiences using QR Codes, NFC tags, and Bluetooth beacons.
Over the last few years, Beaconstac became the chosen platform for over 50,000 businesses worldwide for their proximity marketing needs. We're currently powering over 200 Million QR Code scans worldwide and growing at a 100% rate.
We pride ourselves on being a people-oriented company with investors like Accel and Telescope supporting us in our journey. We are a group of passionate and driven individuals focused on building a world-class product through collaboration.
BeaconstacтАЩs team is spread across India and the USA, with offices in New York and Bangalore.

About Internship:
Beaconstac is looking for Interns who can help their online-style customer intelligence & engagement platform. The duration of the internship is 5-6 months, 5 days a week for the Bangalore location.

Eligibility:
B.Tech/ B.E, MCA & M.Tech(B.Tech/B.E should be the graduate degree) students are eligible for internship.
The internship is for 2023 and 2024 graduates.
6.5+ CGPA
Cutoff score to be accepted for further rounds is 65%
Only top 2000 candidates will be accepted for further rounds depending on their test scores and time taken to solve the question.

Tech Stack:
Frontend: HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node.js, and Rest APIs.
Backend: Python, Django, and REST APIs.
Database: NoSQL and SQL DBs

Salary/Stipend : Rs 30000/month

Number of Openings: 10

Job Location: Bangalore

Responsibilities:
Your responsibilities in this role will include (but not be limited to) the following tasks:
Develop product features and enhancements on our Beaconstac product line
Work closely with product management to extract insights from customers
Develop native iOS/Android/Javascript/Frontend SDKs that works seamlessly with the Beaconstac backend
For daily Job Updates Join Profound Edutech Pvt Ltd Telegram Channel or facebook or Instagram Page

Required skill:
Should be good at algorithms & coding
Good communication skills

About Company:

AIS is IndiaтАЩs leading integrated glass and windows Solutions Company. It provides end-to-end solutions to the customerтАЩs rights from manufacturing, processing, fabrication and installation. It is a sand-to-solutions organization offering varied glass products and solutions for the industrial as well as end customers in the domestic and international markets. AIS strictly adheres to the stringent quality norms of both the global and domestic OEMs and follows all Indian and International quality standards.

 

Role Name      : Graduate Engineer Trainee

Salary              : 4.5 LPA

Location         : Roorkee, Bawal, Taloja, Chennai, Patan

Eligibility        : B.Tech Electrical (Minimum 65% throughout (10th, 12th, Graduation). No Live back paper.)

Joining             : Immediate

Training Period: 6-12 months



Role Description: To Manage Production, Quality and Maintenance Process

Safety:

┬╖         Ensuring safe operating practices are deployed as per SOPs & to ensure safe & accident free workplace in respective process.

┬╖         To make all machine danger free(Danger prediction/KY)

┬╖         Awareness among employees for safety on the shop floor.

Quality Management:

┬╖         To report generation of defects to seniors b) To ensure proper adherence with quality standards as per the customer requirement

PRODUCTIVITY:

┬╖         To run the machine at defined Cycle time.

┬╖         To eliminate Rework generation in process

Cost Reduction:

┬╖         To improve the life of all the key consumables.

MANPOWER DEVELOPMENT:

┬╖         100% involvement of employees in Quality Circle and KAIZEN competitions

 

SHOP FLOOR CONTROL:

┬╖         To ensure all the operations are carried out as per the system and Job standards.

┬╖         To communicate daily issues of shop floor with supervisors c) To interact with Maintenance / Quality sections to resolves daily Gaps in Plan vs. actual

┬╖         Improve 5 s level on shop floor

┬╖         Good Technical skills, Good communication skills & Team Work

Process:
тЧП Group Discussion: A group discussion is a collaborative conversation among candidates where they discuss a given topic, allowing the interviewers to assess their communication, teamwork, and problem-solving skills.

тЧП L1 Technical Interview: The L1 Technical Interview is an initial technical assessment focused on evaluating the candidate's fundamental knowledge and expertise in relevant technical areas for the internship role.

тЧП L2 Technical Interview: The L2 Technical Interview is a more in-depth technical evaluation, often conducted by senior experts, to assess the candidate's advanced skills and problem-solving abilities within the specific field of the internship.

5. Please note that IBM will not provide any travel and accommodation or allowance for attending placement process at any physical location. Candidates must arrange their own travel and accommodation.

6. Project deployment/joining location can be anywhere across PAN India. Hence, we expect the candidates to be flexible in terms of relocation across locations.

 

IBM's discretion is final with respect to the admission of candidates to take part in the recruitment process.

Indovance Inc, was founded in 2003 and maintains its headquarters in Apex, North Carolina, United States with its operations team, Indovance Pvt. Ltd, based in Pune, India. We are a rapidly growing team of 550+ Engineers & Architects providing engineering design and drafting business solutions to Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Architectural and Pre-media companies across USA, Canada, UK and Australia.  All our operations are ISO 9001:2015 certified, making us a budding process driven organization. Our clients range from mid-sized firms to fortune 500 companies and are located all over the globe.  Job Profile тАУ Trainee Design Engineer

Requirements
Education: B.E. Mech
Experience: 0 тАУ 1 yearsKey Functional Area
1. CAD Modelling and detailing with on time Delivery.
2. Application of mechanical aptitude to create the desired CAD output.
3. Strong drawing reading and interpretation
Personal Attributes
1. Excellent written & verbal skills
2. Attention to details.
3. Process oriented
4. Quick learner
5. Ability to work independently & in team.
Key Responsibilities
1. Basic domain knowledge related to - Fabrication/ Casting & Forging/ Machining
2. On time project delivery with accuracy
3. Work on domains like - Fabrication Drawing, Multibody Assembly, Part Modelling, Drafting, Detailing,
Mill Work Knowledge, Heat Exchangers, Pressure Vessels.
4. Understand customer requirement.
5. Ownership of the project assigned.
6. Flexible enough to work in different domain and CAD tools like SolidWorks, Inventor, AutoCAD etc.
7. Ability to apply basic technical aptitude.
Benefits
1. Learning & development programs
2. Growth oriented organization
3. Process driven work
4. Transparent work culture
5. Young & vibrant environment
6. Work-life balance
7. Health insurance
8. Annual health check-up

Requirements

Software- AutoCAD
Experience: 0 тАУ 1 yearsKey Functional Area

4. Quick learner

surveying, GIS mapping, transportation engineering and structural engineering.

external clients.

Under this scheme we will select female students appearing in the final year (4th year) of  engineering & sponsor their last year tuition fees. There is one small condition of signing a Bond. We only want to encourage female students who have decided to get themselves associated with a Swiss based MNC to start their career on successfully completing their engineering. The bond states that, on successfully graduating you will be ready to join Sulzer under the GET (Graduate Engineer Trainees) Scheme. 12/9/23, 19:28 - Sameer Katekar Sir: Campus Placement drive No. 99 for 2024 batch. Registration for  ELEATION, Pune 2024 Batch Civil, Mech Branch Unplaced students Sinhgad Pandharpur Only                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Only Unplaced Interested Students should fill this form. Need to register on or before 11th Dec., 2023 up to 10.00 a.m. only.

Greetings from ELEATIONтАж!!!

 Job Description: Job Title : CAE Project Engineer  

Job location : work from home 

CTC : 4.2 LPA 

Company Name : ELEATION 

яВ╖ Simulation and Analysis: Utilize ANSYS and HyperWorks for simulating structural, thermal, and fluid flow problems. This includes setting up simulations, running analyses, and interpreting results to make informed engineering decisions.

 яВ╖ Model Development: Create detailed and accurate CAE models based on specifications or conceptual ideas. This involves working with geometry, meshing, and setting appropriate boundary conditions. 

яВ╖ Optimization: Employ optimization techniques within the simulation tools to improve product performance, reduce costs, or enhance manufacturability. 

яВ╖ Project Management: Oversee project timelines and deliverables, ensuring high-quality results within specified deadlines. Collaborate with team members, stakeholders, and clients to align project objectives and outcomes. 

яВ╖ Technical Support and Collaboration: Provide technical guidance and support to other engineers and team members. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including design, testing, and manufacturing, to integrate simulation results into broader project goals. 

яВ╖ Reporting and Documentation: Document all phases of the simulation process, including assumptions, methodologies, results, and conclusions. Prepare detailed reports and presentations for internal and external stakeholders. 

яВ╖ Continuous Learning and Improvement: Stay updated with the  latest developments in CAE technologies and methodologies. Contribute to the continuous improvement of simulation processes and workflows within the organization.

  Selection Process : 

яВ╖ Round 1 : Online Technical Test : Engineering Subject 

o Test Duration : 60 minutes o Total number of questions : 50 o Total marks : 100 

o To clear Round 1, You need to score 80 or more marks. 

o All the questions will be MCQ 

o There is no negative marking o All the questions will be from Strength of Material Subject 

яВ╖ Round 2 : Online Technical Test : FEM/FEA and CAE 

o Student scoring 80 or more marks in Round 1 are eligible to attend Round 2. 

o Test Duration : 60 minutes 

o Total number of questions : 50 

o Total marks : 100 

o To clear Round 2, You need to score 80 or more marks. 

o All the questions will be MCQ 

o There is no negative marking 

o All the questions will be from FEM/FEA and CAE Subject. 

яВ╖ Round 3 : Online Technical Interview 

o Students scoring 80 or more marks in Round 2 are eligible to attend Round 3. 

o Technical interview will be conducted using Google Meeting Application. 

o You should have good internet connection, front camera and microphone and speaker (headphone) facility to attend technical interview 

o In technical interview, we will ask 6 questions from FEA/FEM and CAE o You need to give correct answers of 4 or more questions.

 Important information : 

яВ╖ Students clearing Round 3 will get offer letter 

яВ╖ Students will join ELEATION company as CAE Project Engineer 

яВ╖ CTC will be 4.2 LPA. 

яВ╖ This is permanent Work from home profile.

 яВ╖ Students can join ELEATION anytime between 15 th July 2023 to 15th August 2023. 

яВ╖ While joining ELEATION, students need to submit the scanned copy of engineering degree.  

Registration Link:- https://forms.gle/KuxBfKndZdDpptZ1A
